references.reason: This paper introduces the foundational Neural ODE framework, which is directly built upon in the current work.

references.paper_title: Neural flows: Efficient alternative to neural ODEs
references.reason: This paper introduces the Neural Flow framework, which is used as a building block for the proposed model.

references.paper_title: Latent ODEs for irregularly-sampled time series
references.reason: This paper extends the Neural ODE framework to handle irregularly sampled time series, addressing a key challenge tackled in the current work.

references.paper_title: Learning continuous system dynamics from irregularly-sampled partial observations
references.reason: This paper addresses modeling interacting systems from irregularly sampled data, providing a relevant baseline for comparison.

references.paper_title: Semi-supervised classification with graph convolutional networks
references.reason: This paper introduces Graph Convolutional Networks (GCNs), a crucial component within the proposed GNeuralFlow architecture for incorporating graph structure.
